description: The zkApp (Zero-Knowledge Application) implements the logic for private voting where votes for Option A and Option B are cast and counted, but the vote itself is kept private using zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs). relevanceReason: Detailed tutorial with code examples for building a private voting zkApp using o1js on Mina Protocol
